body:
Hi Mostapha, 

thank you for ur reply , I will try it but it's not about the shading device , It's about the wholes made when the device will be opened to ventilate the building . so  I made a hpsrfs to define these wholes  as  openings or windows to make honey bee recognize it in the energy simulation as I need to test air temperature entering through them to building's spaces and the amount of air also .

regards , 

Mona
